size_estimation.reasoning: Based on shirt-to-jeans ratio and shoulder width

gpt_advice:
Product Description:
This stylish outfit consists of a silver shirt and a pair of silver jeans. The colors of the clothes complement each other perfectly, creating a sleek and modern look. The recommended size for this outfit is Medium, based on the shirt-to-jeans ratio and shoulder width.

Outfit Suggestion:
For a casual yet trendy look, pair the silver shirt with the silver jeans. The monochromatic outfit will make a statement while keeping you comfortable and stylish. Add a pair of white sneakers to complete the look.

Social Media Caption:
"Silver vibes all the way! Loving this monochromatic outfit featuring a silver shirt and jeans. #FashionForward #MonochromeMagic ✨👖"
